snippet: With a collaboration between the city’s Department of Records and Ancestry.com, an index to more than 10 million birth, marriage and death records from 1866 to 1948 is accessible to those who create a free account at ancestry.com.
abstract: With a collaboration between the city’s Department of Records and Ancestry.com, an index to more than 10 million birth, marriage and death records from 1866 to 1948 is accessible to those who create a free account at ancestry.com.

headline.main: Index of Millions of New York History Records Available Free Online
